entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking and reacting to Hermione's actions. He is described as leaving out hats for the house-elves and covering them up with rubbish.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as defending her actions of covering the hats with rubbish and setting the house-elves free. She is described as being defiant and angry.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione disagree on whether the house-elves want to be free.
Ron is helping the house-elves by clearing the rubbish off their hats.
Hermione is setting the house-elves free by covering their hats with rubbish.
